properties.title: DAL LAKE
properties.description: Dal lake, the Jewel in the crown of Kashmir, is an urban lake, which is the second largest in  Jammu and Kashmir

properties.title: MEGHALAYA
properties.description: Meghalaya ,a northeastern states of India, is famous for its high rainfall, subtropical forests and biodiversity,

properties.title: MUMBAI
properties.description: Mumbai is the home of the Elephanta Caves, the city's distinctive ensemble of Victorian and Art Deco buildings.

properties.title: MADHYA PRADESH
properties.description: Madhya Pradesh is known as the “Heart of India” . It is the home to cultural and spiritual heritage of India

properties.title: KASHMIR
properties.description: Kashmir is surrounded by the sublime mountains, these valleys echo nature, beauty and a certain level of mysticism.

properties.title: UTTAR PRADESH
properties.description: Uttar Pradesh defines India aesthetically and its rich history that's as ancient as the time known.

properties.title: KERALA
properties.description: Kerala is called as God's own country and famous for its ecotourism initiatives and beautiful backwaters .

properties.title: GOA
properties.description: Goa is famous for overwhelming Beaches,thrilling Water Sports and Entertaining Carnival Festival.

properties.title: WEST BENGAL
properties.description: West Bengal has The Himalayas, The Duars Forests, the vast beaches of The Bay of Bengal, and innumerable rivers

properties.title: SRINAGAR
properties.description: The old city is famous for Dal Lake, and fabulous Kashmiri cuisine,set amidst the granduer of majestic mountains.

properties.title: GULMARG
properties.description: Gulmarg is filled with excellent views of the glorious Himalayas and the scenic beauty and embark on adventures.

properties.title: PAHALGAM
properties.description: Pahalgam is famous for its scenic beauty  and an ideal setting for  hiking, trekking, and fishing.

properties.title: GUJARAT
properties.description: Gujarat is famous for its traditional clothing,food,natural landscapes, Rann of Kutch and colourful handicrafts.

properties.title: AHMEDABAD
properties.description: Ahmedabad is situated on the banks of Sabarmati river and famous for cotton textiles,mouth-watering snack .

properties.title: RAJKOT
properties.description: Rajkot is an industrial town and is famous for the hand made stuffs which are traditional and ethnic.

properties.title: SOMNATH
properties.description: The Somnath temple is located in Veraval in Saurashtra on Gujarat and a pilgrimage and tourist spot of Gujarat.

properties.title: DWARKA
properties.description: The mystique city located on the banks of River Gomti, Dwarka has the story of over 2,500 years to tell.

properties.title: JAMNAGAR
properties.description: Jamnagar of Gujarat state is the home to beautiful lakes,stunning coastline and ancient structures

properties.title: NORTH GOA
properties.description: North Goa lets you spend time in its beaches, clubs, flea markets, forts and the best parties in Goa.

properties.title: SOUTH GOA
properties.description: South Goa has heavenly beaches, glorious temples and churches,wildlife sanctuaries and colossal forts.

properties.title: COCHIN
properties.description: Cochin,the Queen of Arabian Sea,has one of the finest natural harbours and was the centre of the world spice trade.

properties.title: ALLEPPEY
properties.description: Alleppey is famous for its ageless temples,serpentine canals, rice paddies, and a 150-year old lighthouse.

properties.title: KUMARAKOM
properties.description: Kumarakom is a green village on the banks of Vembanad Lake in Kerala's backwaters and its backwater tourism.

properties.title: KOVALAM
properties.description: Kovalam is famous for its beaches and the city is characterized by its endless rows of coconut trees.

properties.title: TRIVANDRUM
properties.description: Thiruvananthapuram is  known for the Padmanabhaswamy Temple, beaches, backwaters and Lion and Deer Safari.

properties.title: GUWAHATI
properties.description: Guwahati is famous for the beautiful Kamakhya temple. There are many temples in the city that will leave you mesmerized.

properties.title: CHERRAPUNJEE
properties.description: Cherrapunji also known as 'Jewel Crest Of Meghalaya' is famous for its natural caves and high waterfalls.

properties.title: NONGRIAT TREK
properties.description: The double decker root bridge, is the most popular attraction of Nongriat in Cherrapunjee region

properties.title: DAWKI
properties.description: A small border town in the Jaintia Hills, Dawki and its famed river Umngot River is a must-visit if in Meghalaya.

properties.title: SHILLONG
properties.description: Shillong adorns beautiful waterfalls, lush green fields, hills and a number of roaring waterfalls.

properties.title: HARIDWAR
properties.description: Haridwar is called the gateway to the Hindu pilgrimage and has amazing mountains, rivers and ancient temples

properties.title: AULI
properties.description: Auli is surrounded by coniferous and oak forests, with a panoramic view of the peaks of the Himalayas

properties.title: RISHIKESH
properties.description: Rishikesh is known as the pilgrimage town and is famous for meditation, yoga, rafting, kayaking, etc.

properties.title: CHOPTA
properties.description: Chopta,hill station is famous for its snow-capped mountains, skiing, trekking, bird watching
